Name: Seaside Cafe Story
About the game: Start from a street food cart and build an established cafe in the most unlikely place: A deserted beach bordering a popular tourist beach in a remote island far to the south! Convince both the tourists and locals to come at your establishment and make them loving it. But that's not at all, the island have its own stories waiting to unfold, depending on your choice! Key Features: Develop your cooking skills and specialize on cooking certain type of dish or just master all of them. Manage the delicious and enticing food and drinks you are going to serve to the island's prospective customer. Design and decorate your cafe with various decorations to cater to the increasing taste of your clientele. Interact with your customers, reject outrageous demand or find the middle ground? Your choice! Discover the story of the island!
